content.en: Fractional-order chaos: Scientists have been studying the behavior of chaotic systems with fractional-order derivatives, and they are using algorithms to control and synchronize these systems. They are exploring various research questions, such as the conditions for synchronizing uncertain chaotic systems, achieving generalized synchronization, observing chaos in systems without equilibrium points, and suppressing chaos in fractional-order systems. The algorithms being used include linear matrix inequality criteria, fractional calculus predictor-corrector algorithm, adaptive sliding mode control, and stability analysis of time-varying systems.
content.da: Kaos af fraktionel orden: Forskere har studeret adfærden af kaotiske systemer med fraktionelle ordensderivater, og de bruger algoritmer til at kontrollere og synkronisere disse systemer. De udforsker forskellige forskningsspørgsmål, såsom betingelserne for at synkronisere usikre kaotiske systemer, opnå generel synkronisering, observere kaos i systemer uden ligevægtspunkter og undertrykke kaos i systemer af fraktionel orden. De anvendte algoritmer inkluderer lineære matrix-ulighedskriterier, fraktionel kalkulus forudsigelse-korrektor-algoritme, adaptiv glidende tilstandsregulering og stabilitetsanalyse af tidsvariable systemer.
